website_summaries.verdict: Outshines the rest with a realistic flame effect, straightforward design, and reliable performance. Superior quality from a trusted brand.
pros: A warm glow combined with well timed flickering produces a convincing natural flame effect, especially when viewed from a few feet away
Flame burns both right side up and upside down
Brighter than many, but no less energy efficient
cons: More expensive than others on our list

customer_reviews.title: Realistic and impressive "flames"!
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic and impressive "flames". Installed in two outdoor fixtures, creates interesting ambience as one approaches the home. Shipping was fast, good packaging, no damage. I would definitely order again. Two year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Kaye

customer_reviews.title: YES...BUY THIS ONE ..NO OTHER.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best of the two lights I ordered. It has a very amber look to it ...basically like the color it is pictured as on amazon. looks the exact same color when lite at night. It was so realistic that my neighbor came over to make sure it was not on fire..lol I love this one but the other is not as pretty of a flame. GET THIS ONE !!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Mistaken for Gas Lanterns!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 5 of these bulbs and these are a simply beautiful addition to our outdoor lighting. Neighbors have dropped by to look at them since they actually thought we had gas lighting installed! Will definitely purchase these again. Fair price, great customer service and fast / secure shipping!
customer_reviews.author: J. Walker

customer_reviews.title: love the special effect flickering flame on this bulb
customer_reviews.text: love the special effect flickering flame on this bulb. Looks very realistic, especially when viewed from at least 15-20 feet away. Hudson Lighting always puts out great light bulbs and I've ordered a lot of their Edison bulbs as well. Can't go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Provides a very different and unique ambiance!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool concept. It really does look like lighting from a small fire - but without the hazard ;) This bulb adds a very different and unique ambiance to any room. Our kids thought it was so cool and were trying to figure out how it can flicker like that!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan and Megan

customer_reviews.title: These are so much better than the pic when ordering
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable! These are so much better than I had anticipated! Do Not go off the little image they show you when ordering. I ordered two more and my friends are amazed by them. The neighbors have even walked up to check them out. Even had a car stop to look at them
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not Reliable at all!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I cannot return these bulbs. I had them installed in my covered outdoor lantern fixtures and they were beautiful...until they stopped working within six weeks. An older version from another manufacturer, I have eight of those, has worked flawlessly and still do. Would recommend that one would be wise to choose another product.
customer_reviews.author: DJW

customer_reviews.title: one worked for 10 minutes (it was beautiful! ) but the second did not work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. one worked for 10 minutes (it was beautiful!) but the second did not work. We took them both out and returned the defective one. The replacement came and it DID NOT work and the original one that worked, does not work now. Other light bulbs are working just fine in the fixture and we tried these bulbs in multiple fixtures...they do not work
customer_reviews.author: amd

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: We bought of set of these, and they lasted a few months then went out. They were under warranty so we got another set. They only lasted a couple of weeks. Then we purchased another set, apparently not learning our lesson, and they didn't last more than a couple of weeks either. They looked nice when they worked, just disappointed they did not last long for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Davis

customer_reviews.title: lights go great in my new basement Bar/Man Cave
customer_reviews.text: lights go great in my new basement Bar/Man Cave. I will be buying more in the future. they are well built.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Argent

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received this in the mail today and we're pleasantly surprised at how realistic the flame looks on the bulb. We sat down and ordered a new light fixture for it just to showcase it better. My husband saw a YouTube video or something about it is a top quality product. The light bulb is longer than a normal light bulb but fits in a regular socket. I'm excited to get the new fixture to really showcase this light. We will be reordering this whenever the bulb dies out.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 2 mos., now flashes
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bulb at first; pretty realistic especially from a distance. After 2 months of constantly being on it began to flash -- it goes totally dark for a fraction of a second, then flashes very bright, flickers for a few seconds then repeats the process. I'll be tossing it when it gets too obnoxious, which i'm guessing will be very soon. Bummer because it was pretty while it worked properly.
customer_reviews.author: Sluggo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: Bulb was dead on arrival just as previous reviewer stated. We tried several lamps and they all worked with other bulbs, but not the flame LED. We returned it for refund and found another flame LED.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Bulb looks amazing and the effect is beautiful but died after 6 months, will update to 5 stars if the company honors the warranty
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly attractive.
customer_reviews.text: We've done the fake candles with the moving wicks, and the blinky-LED nonsense we found at Pier One. But this LED flame effect bulb is very attractive! From a reasonable distance, it simulates the random flickering of a small flame. On our front porch, it looks like there are actually gas lights from the old days. The accelerometer works well too - we flipped it upside down and the flame continues to shoot upwards. Burned it in for 48+ hours, no problems, very little heat. Nice work, Hudson.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: LED Flicker Flame Light Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are very bright and the flame effect is outstanding. I ordered these on Friday, they arrived via USPS on Sunday. The picture doesn't do them justice. Seller also emailed me on Monday checking to make sure the bulbs arrived on time and in working order. They also promised replacements if they were damaged in shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Mc Nair

customer_reviews.title: Great flicker bulb.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok. Looks nice in a translucent fixture and ok in a clear fixture from a distance. A real flame of comparable size (tiki torch, gas lamp, etc) is not quite as orange and holds stable without flickering (unless windy) more so than this does, however the effect is excellent for ambiance and mood - not to mention holiday decor. Much more realistic than the very-orange vintage/traditional neon flicker bulbs. Will probably order more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Not a presented
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: 3 1/2 Months and 1 of the 4 has completely stopped working. As much as these cost they should certainly last longer than this. To be honest not great. I saw much better at huaquangbei in Shenzhen for less than $4.. the LEDs are very obvious and it doesnt look natural.. speed is also unnatural
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Fooled some friends.
customer_reviews.text: Brightness...Perfect, Color...Perfect, Flame action...Perfect! These look so real, they have fooled some friends into asking if it's safe for us to have flames to close to our log home walls. If they were any brighter, they wouldn't look like real flames. We compared these to some others, and these were by FAR the most realistic looking. They also do not seem to draw any bugs. We were running 2 watt LED's in our outside fixtures before these, and even they drew tons of bugs. These do not. I don't know if it's the color, or the motion of the flames, but the bugs seem to avoid them. Highly recommended! We are buying some more for our back patio.
customer_reviews.author: David Obergoenner

customer_reviews.title: 2nd best in flame bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand and Omicoo based off youtube reviewers, one who is pretty popular. He reviewed 4 different bulbs including the 'as seen on TV' version. It and another one totally sucked. This brand came in at 2nd, while the Omicoo was 1st. I bought this brand and Omicoo. This brand doesn't hold a candle (pun intended) still to the Omicoo. It still had a digital flame look to it, while the Omicoo is the most realistic flame bulb out there right now.
customer_reviews.author: Jaihawk

customer_reviews.title: Realistic bulb and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I Love this bulb, it moves more like a real flame. I tried some others that either had a strobe or unrealistic flashing effect. This bulb looks more like a real flame and the color is great too, more orange than yellow. I will be buying two more for stairway, cool idea for Halloween as well. Update: one of my bulbs quit working, I contacted customer service and they sent me a replacement. Very nice and prompt customer service. I will definitely order again. Cheryl with Hudson lighting is wonderful she checked back with me a week later just to make sure my bulb was working and not damaged. Great customer service and awsome products.
customer_reviews.author: Puffers two

customer_reviews.title: Realistic bulb light, albeit slightly too fast flame action.
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool. Have them out front by on my garage flankers and they look amazing coming up the street, so saw an opportunity to try some inside in the stairs. Think they look pretty good there, too. A slight homage to the craftsman/cottage style of our home. My only ding on these is they are pretty active. Maybe they’d add three speeds set with successive on/offs to slow down each time and then lock there until that is repeated, ala the Phillips scenesmart bulbs...Just want a little less ‘tribal council’ and more chill. That speed issue makes me rate four stars, but having the courage to put a Bible verse on the box, restores a 5 from me.
customer_reviews.author: DJ&JC

customer_reviews.title: worked for 1 week
customer_reviews.text: Well at first I loved it. I would walk to the road or go for a ride to see my house from afar.. I got compliments on this. Now, after 1 week it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: W.M.

customer_reviews.title: Color is too orange
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at these LED Flame Effect Light Bulbs for weeks and decided to order a couple for our front porch fixtures. After installing both and flipping the switch - Whoa! This isn't Halloween! Both lights were way too orange. Very disappointed. I tried the lights in two other locations just to see if the orange color might work, but I was still unhappy with the orange color. If the flame effect had been yellow I would have been pretty happy. It cost me $7.21 for return shipping, but I just couldn't make the orange color work for us. Maybe there's another brand out there that is a yellow flame. Please let me know if you find one.
customer_reviews.author: Burl W. Luscombe

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but burns out fast.
customer_reviews.text: I love the flame effect of these bulbs but they burn out fast. I use these bulbs in 6 fixtures. Since August of this year, I've already had to replace three of them. Three months is not a lot of time. No response on warranty. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Matteo

customer_reviews.title: Bad@$$ bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are affordable and completely realistic. We have them upright and upside down. As far as how realistic the flame looks, the fixtures we have them in have Amber Glass as opposed to clear glass so that makes them warmer. ...and our house is a Spanish styled house so the amber glass fits the theme well. If I could upload a video of how completely bad@$$ they look I would.
customer_reviews.author: BGuy

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 9 Months
customer_reviews.text: Unit lasted only ~9 months before no longer working. Item is listed as in/outdoor and I beleive the original packaging (which I do not have) stated a two year warrenty of some kind. Unit was placed in a weather protected outdoor lamp post with ample room to breath (led should have minimal heat regardless). Light was only on from dusk to dawn. - Other than the failure I have no complaints and would otherwise give five stars. Item does not have "modes" that get cycled or reset with power on/off. One nice patern and it has a sensor to sense if it's upside down.
customer_reviews.author: ShamWow

customer_reviews.title: Old Fashioned Gas Lamp Look at its Best!
customer_reviews.text: I love these light bulbs. I purchased for my light post. My neighbors all liked the effect so much that they all ordered them for their light posts. Then my one neighbor ordered for the lighting outside of the garage. It looked so pretty that all the rest of us ordered. Now we have a street with these lights on our whole cul-de-sac. It looks beautiful!!! I highly recommend. I can't comment on the longevity as we just began using them. But if our whole street went to them for their outside lighting - you know you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: christiecarr

customer_reviews.title: I really like these lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 different manufactures of these lights to compare and this one wins the 5 star. The other only gets 4 because of the fact that this light I bought does not have the 3 effect modes. Turn it on and it flickers a flame look. Turn it off then on and it flickers the flame look. Do that to the other one and it goes into a funny effect which I don't care for. I put these lights in a motion sensor light and I live in a mobilehome park and cars driving by or people walking their dog set the light off each time. So...keep that in mind when buying.
customer_reviews.author: SrMac

customer_reviews.title: Strobe effect
customer_reviews.text: This light has something of a strobing effect, where it's going totally on and totally off fairly rapidly, rather than a continuous flickering glow. My family found it bothersome and we uninstalled it.
customer_reviews.author: ljoycew

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bulb
customer_reviews.text: This bulb is fabulous. It definitely looks like flames and was delivered promptly and in excellent condition. I am so happy with it. The company that sells this bulb actually sent me an email checking to see that I got it and that it was in good shape and working! That impressed me the most. I will be buying more from this company. They have great products and made me feel like a valued customer.
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: Strobe light?
customer_reviews.text: This concept is awesome. However, it was more of a strobe light than a calming fire effect. It has a warm glow but it flashes way to much. Gave me a headache after 2 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: The roof is on FIRE!!!! 🔥
customer_reviews.text: Love these unique lights! Purchased them for lanterns on front of house for Halloween. I picked these lights over the competitors because they have upside down capabilities and have only one mode (flame)—so they do not require turning off and on multiple times to reach the preferred flame mode. Simply turn on lights and be mesmerizing. I can’t speak of longevity, yet I’m not concerned given this companies warranty. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, they don't last...
customer_reviews.text: the bulbs are really great when they're working but after two months, I now have two of my four bulbs die over the weekend. Not good...
customer_reviews.author: DTownsend

customer_reviews.title: Magic torchlight
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are the closest thing to magic I have seen. They fit a regular light socket, and give off a moving firelight glow. It isn't as bright as even a 60 watt bulb, but it feels like real firelight. And since it is LED, it doesn't heat up like a regular light bulb. We really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Evans

customer_reviews.title: Big difference between seeing it on camera and in person
customer_reviews.text: I watched videos sent in by customers and the light looked more like it was flickering then a flame but because of good reviews I took a chance and ordered it. I put it in an outdoor lamp post in my garden and was amazed. Looked like real fire, I thought the top of the fixture was going to melt. I posted it on Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: anthony maniaci

customer_reviews.title: Worked great..
customer_reviews.text: Worked great...for 3 days. Sadly now the light is dead. It was only on for about 10 hours total. It should last longer than that! Now being returned. A definite disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Flame effect lights
customer_reviews.text: Rating it 5 Star as the product looks great. My only concern is the longevity. Package indicates “30,000 hours at 3 hours per day”. Is that the recommended daily use time? I have the lights installed in coach lanterns and timed to go on with my other outdoor lighting, which stays on around 9 hours daily. At a 30,000 hour life those bulbs could last 9 years which is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C.

customer_reviews.title: cool light,... while it was working.
customer_reviews.text: cool effect with this light bulb. worked great ...for about 6 months. hudson lighting says there is a 2 yr. warranty, so i emailed and they sent me another bulb. GREAT! ....but they said if it fails that's it, they've fulfilled the warranty with the replacement. so i get the new bulb and guess what?... the filament (or whatever is in there) is rattling around inside. ...it does work for now, but the rattling inside does NOT reassure me. so buyer beware! seems to me a 2 yr. warranty should last 2 years!! ...NOT 2 bulbs!!
customer_reviews.author: theendisnear

customer_reviews.title: Nice bulb for faking a flame
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim for my son, set it up in his room and he loves it (especially with Halloween approaching). The light produced is a deep orange, like a low sapwood flame, and the flickering is a realistic waving rather than the strobing effect sometimes seen. Overall a very cool idea and good implementation. Note that my wife hates it because she says "it's going to give me a seizure" (she has never had a seizure, just being dramatic).
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Very nice flame effect, only one mode
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some other variations of flame lights, these only have one mode, but that's all I need it to do! I got these to add a very nice feel to our front carriage lights while we have the Christmas lights up. They work rights side up or upside down (there's a little switch you can here click when you flip it over). I bought these based on the reviews and was not disappointed in their effect! I will update in the future if/when they burn out. They're a little on the expensive side, but nothing too ridiculous considering we only need a few.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Lukefahr

customer_reviews.title: Have everyone on your street wondering who's house is on fire.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after seeing a neighbor's house with them during an evening stroll. The effect is fantastic. It really is like your lights have turned into flickering torches. Just a note, they provide much less illumination than other bulbs, so if you're trying to light up a large area for safety, you'll be making some compromises by using these. But stylistically, they are awesome. One of my favorite impulse home purchases ever. Clever design and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Whimsy

customer_reviews.title: I really like the flame effect of this bulb
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this bulb for our yard light. It's super impractical due to price and longevity but after the first one, I just cant see going back to an ordinary bulb. I still get a giggle whenever I catch a passer by doing a double take. Because of the fixture it's in it looks like an old timey flickering gas lamp and I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: . Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly realistic
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to see this bulb works as advertised. It truly gives off the illusion of a real burning flame, night or day. Still images do not do it justice. Seeing its movement in the outdoor lamppost is truly remarkable. It appears as if it is truly a burning flame. I am considering buying another for another exterior light fixture. It also looks great under a lamp shade or globe. It gives off a very old fashioned gas light experience. The light is a more fire amber than white but the area surrounding is still fairly illuminated.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good, But a Little too Orange.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these bulbs and they all worked perfectly on arrival. The auto sense feature also worked well. When the bulbs were inverted, the "flames" adjusted automatically to rise from the bottom again. They are DIM, they emit an amount of light that would probably be equivalent to an incandescent 10W bulb, so don't use these as your main "security" light. They are for Ambiance only! I used them in exterior fixtures with frosted glass and they looked strikingly realistic with the one small exception that the "flames" are more orange than yellow. True gas lanterns tend to have a yellowish white flame not so orange, so that part is a dead giveaway.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic decorative lighting in the right situation
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic looking, but has some limitations that you should understand before purchasing. First, it looks best behind obscured glass. Clear see through glass will show off the bulb, which is not that attractive, although it will still look pretty good at night. Obscured glass that can't clearly be seen through will show off the flaming light show without seeing the bulb. Second, it does not put off a great amount of light. If decorative lighting or low level lighting is what you're looking for, this is perfect. It is really a fantastic product in the right place.
customer_reviews.author: Zenithon

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A single mode, great quality! Simple on or off!
customer_reviews.text: My parents house has a nighttime auto-on outdoor lantern that has no switch. It turns itself on when it senses that it's dark out. So I needed bulbs that turn off and on only; no modes, no solid on, just flame on or flame off. It took me months to try and find the right bulbs. These are perfect! And great quality! They still have the gravity control, so upside down or not, they the flame is always from the bottom. Very happy with my purchase and my parents are so thrilled, they sat outside in 15°F weather just to watch them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bulb for holiday ambiance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bulb and put it in our exterior sconce light to accompany our Christmas lights. I was very surprised by how realistic the flames looked from the road and even up close. The bulb also emitted enough light to serve its purpose so we could see well enough to easily enter and exit the house on the darkest of nights. I put this in without my wife knowing about it and she was very surprised by the change. We've now received many compliments from guests and I'm sure friends will be purchasing their own.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T. M.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product, Never thought I’d see something like this
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product, Never thought I’d see something like this, very amazing how well it works and absolutely looks just like fire. And the flicker effect that it produces is very cool as well. Highly recommend Buy one for your family your father your mother your brother your sister someone you don’t even like will love this.🤪
customer_reviews.author: Darin2470

customer_reviews.title: Very effective/just ordered another one
customer_reviews.text: I tried one in a post lamp for my front yard. It has a bubble glass shade and the flame effect is really realistic. It's hard to see a "pattern" that you might expect in something like this. I don't think anyone would think I'd added gas, but it's not a cheesy effect at all. I've ordered 2 more for the front porch lights during the holiday season only. Update: After one year of nightly use one bulb failed. To me that's par for any outdoor light bulb, so I ordered another one. Great product and the company ships well protected merchandise. G
customer_reviews.author: RJackson

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well. Placed it on the porch outside. It looks and functions great! The fixture I put it in has water glass and with the bulb on looks just like real flames. Color is great also. Plenty of light for the entry. I will buy again. Post script: bulb burned out after 8 months. Customer service may be the best I have dealt with over many years. Response was same day. Once verified as a legit purchase I received immediate access to order another free. Great!
customer_reviews.author: chiporter

customer_reviews.title: Very cool bulb.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to find something like this for years. Standard candle flicker bulbs were weak (and not the effect I wanted), and I didn’t want a strobe. I wanted something more like a shorting out effect. This bulb is SO awesome - I got TONS of compliments. I have a historic house and used it as my porch light for Halloween. It gave a great creepy electricity-glitching vibe. Not exactly the shorting out effect, but as close as I’ve ever found. Used it for the whole month of October and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Taracles

customer_reviews.title: Flame Effect Light Bulb
customer_reviews.text: I love the flame effect. Arrived on time and looks well made. I originalky installed it in an outdoor light post. That fixure had a sensor to detect light & darkness. As it started to get dark outside the bulb flashed and came in intermittently and stopped working. I took it out and put it in another outdoor fixture without the sensor and it works fine. Will see how long the bulb lasts being this fixture is only on when light is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I received my LED Flame Effect Light from UPS to find that the product worked, but somehow during shipping, the wiring was messed up or something and only half of the flame worked. I'm giving this 5 stars because I contacted Hudson and with no hassle or "back and forth", I had a replacement, working product at my door within the next 48 hours. Things happen, customer service is EXTREMELY important because of this fact. As for the product itself, it works great; looks like a flame and does what it says. I'd buy another one if I had use for it right now and probably will again in the future I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: EventHorizon

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I placed it behind my 65" LED TV, play a fire place on YouTube and the effect its nice, as you watch the fire place with the fire crackling sound and this light bulb projecting the fire light on the wall behind with you living room lights very dim the effect of a working fire place feels almost real.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: LED Flickering Flame Bulb
customer_reviews.text: The “flame” effect is fairly decent but only on 1⁄2 of the bulb. After installing in my outdoor lights you could see the individual led’s on the side facing out. The side with the best representation of a flame is facing inwards. I had to put a couple of washers in the fixture so that when the bulb was screwed in the “good” side would be facing out. This is a HUGE no-no but I had to try and get the bulb in the right position. Looks like the hunt for a single mode led flame light continues.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and dependable
customer_reviews.text: I have exterior lights that are activated automatically (sun down) . These lights have been installed for about a year and they are still going strong. Very cool accent to my curb appeal, especially on Halloween. My HOA requires that we have lights accenting our garage door. These are by far the coolest lights on my culdesac. My fixtures aren't motion activated, so I can't attest to their reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn St John

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far the bulbs are bright and offer realistic flame appearance. They definitely look more realistic behind a frosted pane or shade (which I absolutely would say about any of these). The light is very warm and I look forward to seeing them in action in the dark. As I just received them, I cannot yet speak to the life of the bulbs, but will update if there are any crazy defects that kill the bulbs in a very short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Byington

customer_reviews.title: If you think lighting is everything...
customer_reviews.text: A realistic facsimile of gas lights, I absolutely love these bulbs! Be aware, though - too many in tandem can be a bit dizzying. I have one in a lampost, one on a single fixture in my backyard, and that's perfect. Tried 3 within a short distance from each other and thought the effect was a bit "Halloween". Wish they came in a somewhat less orange shade.
customer_reviews.author: the fabulous Ms Jane

customer_reviews.title: Prepare for a seizure
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a very smooth change of light/flickering. It’s more like you’re at a rave or something. It’s actually pretty awful to look at. It’s like it’s glitchy.... I wanted something like this because my in laws have one and I fell in love with it! Will have to ask them exactly where they bought their bulbs
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection doesn't exist, so I'm giving this four stars.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the lightbulb. It works as expected and the effect is quite nice, I was expecting a more realistic torch experience, but it's ok, I know technology will continue to evolve and eventually we will have something as real as fire. The light bulb looks well built and great quality. Customer service seems to be top notch, I received a very nice email from the company asking for my satisfaction. So far so good, I will update in a few months after having this buddy burning all night.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Manuel Mestayer Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way it looks, but in my opinion you need to see the bulb to fully appreciate it. I have it in a cool little table lamp on my patio. My wife bought an industrial-type cage for the bulb instead of the traditional lampshade that we tried first. In the shade it just looked like a flickering light, but with the bulb exposed to view in this cage you can really see the “flame” effect and it is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We love these flame bulbs, we got two almost one year ago. One of the bulls stopped working after about 10 months, I contacted Hudson and sent in my receipt, within one week I had a replacement bulb! Great customer service. They look great and as we are at the end of dirt road, they can be seen from the other end, very neat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Red

customer_reviews.title: stoppped working after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love your bulb. just exactly what I wanted. however, it stopped working after 3 days. Now, the problem is I bought a lot of these bulbs and now have to wonder if this was just a fluke or will they all go bad in a few days. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: My house looks like a castle now
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs are affordable and look great at night. So great that three of my neighbors have gotten the same or similar bulbs. They aren’t as bright as standard bulbs, which people might not like, but if they were any brighter I don’t think you would believe that they are flames as much as they are. So it’s kind of a trade off of brightness for the look. Regardless, I’m very happy and obviously my neighbors like the look as well.
customer_reviews.author: slay invisible

customer_reviews.title: Quality built in USA.
customer_reviews.text: The Lums 200 was just a little too bright (not there fault)for me but I put a white rag over it to tone it down s little. I put In an outside chimenea put white cloth on it then add kindling in the front. So brightness got a big 5 stars. The action is probably as good as can from a bulb.this was during daylight, so at night it’s really bright
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Look great until they fail after a month [Updated]
customer_reviews.text: Update: after our original review the company sent us three replacements. All three lights have worked as expected since Jan 2019 (4 months) with no issues. It must have just been a bad batch we initially received. Old review: We bought 3 of these lights for outdoor entry lights at the end of 2018. So far two of them have failed. One flashes and the other one completely died. While they look great when they work, I would avoid this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Fire light
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and enjoy an ambiance that is different, then this is for you. It works in both directions, up and down, i have them in my front porch lights and give off a very cool effect. I use them in lanterns, Halloween decorations, and sometimes even in my lamps in my living room. They work well, seem to be well made, and aren't terribly expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Blub Looks Very Realistic
customer_reviews.text: Price and look are great. I just installed it. Will have to wait to see how is does in the longevity department. But for now I really like. Thirty minutes after I installed in our yard light, I had people walking by investigating it. I think they thought it was a real gas light. The video does not due it justice. But it is the best I can do, It looks better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Sether

customer_reviews.title: Great product quality and stellar customer service
customer_reviews.text: We love these lights, and the effects they put off. They look like real gas flame lights from the street. We have three now, and this is all I will use for my out door garage lights going forward. The company also has great customer service. I had one come in damaged, and instead of making me go through a return and reorder process with Amazon, Hudson took care of it right away. I will be a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy White Jr

customer_reviews.title: If you love gaslight......
customer_reviews.text: On a recent visit down south saw a lamp that looked as if it were gaslight. Asked the owner, and she said it was a bulb. When I got back to New York went on Amazon and found this bulb. Just what I was looking for. The bulb arrived safely (well packaged). Good quality bulb. Put it in my outdoor lantern. Wow. Looks just like gaslight. Flickers beautifully. Love this bulb. I am having a new lamp installed. Will be back to purchase another for the new lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Judi R.

customer_reviews.title: I did my research...
customer_reviews.text: After watching various review videos, analyzing pricing of similar bulbs, and finally making a purchase, I can safely say this is one of - if not the best flame effect bulbs on the market currently. It’s a little on the bright side so it may require a tinted enclosure for small rooms - large rooms it’ll perform great. It’s not radiating electrical noise, it doesn’t get past warm, and it has a fairly natural, “windy flame” look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: impressive
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about what to expect with this bulb but I'm really glad I bought it. I love that it is LED, standard fit base, and it actually looks like a candle flame flickering through the crystal cylinder lamp I placed it in. I tried to take video but the video made it look totally different than it does. My video made it look white but the light is amber like a candle flame. The amber flame is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Terrilynn75672

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, not best for security lighting.
customer_reviews.text: I’m digging this light bulb. I thought it was unique and added a lot to the style of my brick front my home. I’m using it in the front of the house which is beautiful, but it’s isn’t bright so not best for security.
customer_reviews.author: NorthernVAgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great one mode option!
customer_reviews.text: These are good flame lights. The best part is they are only one mode, so you can use them where sensors turn them on. Others when power is removed and restored, they change modes from flames to one or other things. If you are using these type bulbs on a porch or dawn to dusk, you need this one mode type, which you would think wouldn’t be hard to find, but it has been. So bottom line, get these bulbs that are lighting the world! :-)
customer_reviews.author: maddog24

customer_reviews.title: My neighbors asking where I got these - Hudson/ through  Amazon. Choose Hudson my friends.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak on longevity but so far I like these. Look very realistic. Like gas rather than electricity. I hope they last. I was impressed with Hudson sending me an email to make sure the lights were delivered safely and asked if I was satisfied. That’s GOOD Customer Service !!!! Yes I’m happy- just ordered a back- up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great bulb, great price, great company.
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that a neighbor had this spectacular gas light on their front porch...wait, gas light? It had to be some kind of lightbulb. A little investigating and I found the bulb. Then I found Hudson Light Bulbs. What a wonderful company. I'll be ordering more to give as gifts to family, friends and neighbors. Thank you Hudson.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: LED flickers
customer_reviews.text: Added a video and picture to help with your purchasing decision of this lightbulb. What isn't easily visible in the photo is the individual flickers of lights replicating flames. This bulb appears to be more for ambiance than lighting. I wanted more of a 'one flame ' effect but my husband likes the 'multi movement' which he says is more realistic to fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like A Fire, Not A Candle or Oil Lamp Flame
customer_reviews.text: I will use these. But, they are not what I expected. The effect mostly resembles a fire type flame, and not the softer, flickering, intermittent glow you would expect from a candle or an oil lamp flame. So, I would recommend this to anyone who wants to create a "fire like" flickering effect. But NOT to those who want a softer candle or oil lamp flickering effect.
customer_reviews.author: J B Lesleh

customer_reviews.title: Ordered again
customer_reviews.text: Lasted right at two years. Have automatic sensor for dusk/dawn, so it runs a lot more than three hours a day. Very happy with it - just ordered two more. The flame look is very realistic and provides a nice decorative touch to the front yard. The light brightness is fine - but don't expect it to "light the night."
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hinshaw

customer_reviews.title: Very orange, not realistic
customer_reviews.text: We returned this bulb due to it's aesthetics. It was very orange and did not look like a flame at all. It does flicker, but that's about it. It is also not very bright. I would rather have a normal bulb than this orange illumination - gives off too much of a Halloween vibe.
customer_reviews.author: Emma B.

customer_reviews.title: These are FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about how these would look. The arrived yesterday afternoon, and I installed them. Since the fixtures they are in are on a timer, I didn't bother to turn them on. When we got home after an evening out, they were lit up and "doing their thing." They look fantastic. The flame effect is very realistic and, surprisingly, they throw off a pretty good amount of light. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SoCalScott

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time researching other brands, buy this one!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about these lights. I installed 3 in an antique post light that I have in my back yard that highlight the pool. The post lights are enclosed by a frosted acorn style plant light cover. The lights give off a very relaxed flicker that resembles a campfire. Sets the mood perfectly! Doesn’t look cheesy at all. I get compliments all the time. I liked them so much I bought 4 more for the rest of my exterior light posts around the house. 1 by the front door, 2 next to the garage, and 1 on the back patio. My house looks like a medieval castle, and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd ordered two, but only ordered one. So, I'm back to order another as the first one is fantastic. It is bright, beautiful flame. It's so lifelike, I caught myself wondering if it was going to get too hot for the light housing. Yes, it was only a very brief thought (thank goodness) - but that is how lifelike this is. It is so charming and different. Worth every penny. Buy one for all your outside lights.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: VERY BRIGHT and very active flicker
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs will replace the battery-operated 'candleflames' we use in our Christmas display, to replicate a fire in the 'fireplace'. i have tested them and found each bulb puts out way more light than the bundle of candles did, but they do look much more like actual fire. I think we're going to be very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K. Payton

customer_reviews.title: Realistic-looking flame
customer_reviews.text: We received one as a gift about a year ago and never got around to installing it in our outdoor lamp. Well, we finally did and we were so pleasantly surprised at how realistic the flames looked! A friend ordered a different brand and it was really cheesy - the light danced so slowly that it looked more like a lava lamp. So I went back to the original gift-giver and got the specifics on our bulb. We've ordered several of these bulbs since, including the smaller candlebra ones. We are absolutely delighted by them! More expensive than the competition's, but worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne DeMaio

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is what you need to know: Even though they all look the same, not all flame bulbs are created equal. After I ordered this one, I saw what looked to be the same product (different brand) from a big box retailer, so I bought it. When this came, I figured I'd use it in the back of my house. Well it came, and boy oh boy, is the quality of the flame better. So I'd definitely recommend this product over others!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan K.

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Seller is sending replacements!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The seller contacted me after seeing my review, and is sending replacement bulbs! I’m impressed with their approach to customer service! The first bulb failed after three months of nightly use. The second failed after 6 months. They just flash like a slow strobe light. They were pretty when they worked. But, I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After Two Days
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointing; one of four of the lights purchased stopped working after just two days. Returning for refund. Update to original review. Company refunded all my money for all five bulbs after they all failed over the course of two months. Company unable to explain why all the bulbs failed so soon after purchase. Gave the company an extra star for refunding all my money.
customer_reviews.author: MOronks

customer_reviews.title: FOOLED THE NEIGHBORS
customer_reviews.text: I read about this product and thought it would be neat looking. I didn't think it was going to actually fool my neighbors. Apparently it is so realistic looking they thought my house had caught fire. Lol! One of them knocked on my door in a panic to warn me! I plan to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: JanetD

customer_reviews.title: Dead in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for the Halloween season. Installed beginning of October. Dead before halloween. Bummer because they do have a nice effect when working. Changed to 3 stars due to the quick response from the seller and immediate refund. Hopefully they get the bugs worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas1963

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product with Matching Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these bulbs previously and they performed well for quite some time. Upon failure of one of the bulbs, I reached out to Hudson Lighting for a replacement. They were quick to provide a replacement of the failed bulb. Within a couple of weeks, the other bulb also failed. They were also quick to replace the 2nd bulb. Cheryl at Hudson Lighting is a great customer representative and quick to address your issues. I highly recommend this product and even more so I recommend supporting Hudson Lighting!
customer_reviews.author: jMac62103

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased... and the I wasn't!  Nov.27, 2018
customer_reviews.text: So this is my second review and I've had the bulb for almost 2 MONTHS and it's dead! I have contacted the seller to see how they will honor the 2 YEAR warranty. It was really nice when it was working. I hope I'll be able to report that they honored their warranty. Will update soon.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Heron

customer_reviews.title: Longevity to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: They don’t last. Lasts for maybe 500-1,000 hours and then burn out. The manufacturer is friendly and replaces them, but it is a haste to need to contact them and get replacements. I purchased a total of 7 of them about 18 months ago to use in my dining room. I only use them when I have guests over. Out of those 7, 3 have been replaced and another 2 are needing replacement now. I’m not going to bother and just try a different brand instead.
customer_reviews.author: Peter T.

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally leave reviews on products but I was really impressed with this Flame Effect Bulb. I watched a youtube review of the top 4 bulbs and this one was his favorite so I took a chance and bought it. It's best in the full darkness and looks very real but it looks ok when its partially dark also. My Daughter thought this was a real flame when she got home and saw it. I live in Minnesota and we have had some unusually warm weather for December so I still need to see if this works when its 10 degrees out. I will buy more of these for sure.
customer_reviews.author: mike newberg

customer_reviews.title: Too much flicker?!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this almost kills the ambiance of the evening because its like a strobe in your peripheral. It looks really cool and maybe if you had like 2 of them with a third constant light source on your porch it might work better.
customer_reviews.author: Dana H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flame affect and quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this light bulb. The whole concept is awesome. I just wish the color was a little less intense. I would like one a little less orangey yellow. This is definitely cool for Halloween, but I wanted one more for everyday. I still have it in, but hope this company will release different shade options. Great quality though. Awesome flame affect as well.
customer_reviews.author: janna85

customer_reviews.title: Nice effect but not very bright
customer_reviews.text: These have a natural looking flame effect and add a bit of ambience to an outdoor living area. They are not very bright and I would place them at the equivalence of under a 40 W bulb.
customer_reviews.author: G. VO

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, can't wait to use them
customer_reviews.text: So we ordered the bulb before the lights to put them in I will be ordering 3 more because they look great. I don't know how long they last right now I only have sockets that go down and I will soon have upward sockets for these special bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Terri T.

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and flame is realistic looking
customer_reviews.text: It is really a cool light. I did have to take it out of my front porch light though, because it looked so realistic, my neighbors thought the light fixture was on fire. So I am using it in the house and enjoying it there. They did a good job designing this.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

product_meta.title: LED Flame Effect Light Bulb: E26 Standard Base Flame Bulb - Upside Down Effect - 3W - 200 Lumen - Energy Efficient Flickering Fire Lights for Indoor/Outdoor Use - 1 Pack
feature_bullets: ✅ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We are a US-based company with exceptional and responsive customer service! We work closely with our manufacturers to produce top-quality LED Flame Effect Light Bulbs for our customers.
✅ ENERGY EFFICIENT: Manufactured to last with energy-saving LED technology, our LED Flame Bulb only uses 3 watts of power and keeps more money in your pocket!
✅ ATTENTION TO DETAIL: Flicker flame light bulb creates a unique look by emitting a realistic flame effect and casting a warm, inviting glow
✅ BEST USE: Our Fire Light Bulb features a standard-sized E26 base which is suited for most lighting fixtures both indoors and outdoors.
✅ AUTO-ROTATION: Watch as the flame effect on these flickering light bulbs flips to match the orientation of the bulb.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,351 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
